headline: DNS-Over-TLS Built-In & Enforced - 1.1.1.1 and the GL.iNet GL-AR750S
keywords: 1.1.1.1, DNS, TLS, Privacy, Resolver, IoT, Security
description: Back in April, I wrote about how it was possible to modify a router to encrypt DNS queries over TLS using Cloudflare's 1.1.1.1 DNS Resolver and a GL.iNet router; the folks at GL.iNet read that blog post and decided to bake DNS-Over-TLS support into their new router using the 1.1.1.1 resolver.
